title: 1978년 Dees 사건

## 사건 정보

**사건명**: State Ex Rel. Bickman v. Dees
**판결일**: 1978-12-21
**법원**: Supreme Court of Louisiana
**관할**: Louisiana, LA

**판사**: Per Curiam

## 인용

- 367 So. 2d 283

## 판결문 요약


367 So. 2d 283 (1978)
STATE of Louisiana ex rel. Joseph BICKMAN
v.
Hayden J. DEES, Warden, Dixon Correctional Institute.
STATE of Louisiana ex rel. Kent BELL
v.
Hayden J. DEES, Warden, Dixon Correctional Institute.

v.
Hayden J. DEES, Warden, Dixon Correctional Institute.

v.
Hayden J. DEES, Warden, Dixon Correctional Institute.

v.
Hayden J. DEES, Warden, Dixon Correctional Institute.
STATE of Louisiana ex rel. David GIFFORD
v.
Hayden J. DEES, Warden, Dixon Correctional Institute.
STATE of Louisiana ex rel. Robert N. PAULHUS a/k/a Robert N. O'Brien
v.
CUSTODIAN OF RECORDS OF LOUISIANA STATE PENITENTIARY, C. Paul Phelps, Secretary, Department of Corrections, Frank Blackburn, Warden, Louisiana State Penitentiary. *284
STATE of Louisiana ex rel. Nelson MANUEL
v.
C. Paul PHELPS, Secretary, Department of Corrections.
STATE of Louisiana ex rel. Bruce HINKLEY
v.
C. Paul PHELPS, Secretary, Department of Corrections.
Nos. 62496, 62696, 62717, 62800, 62802, 62918, 62969, 63069 and 63072.
Supreme Court of Louisiana.
December 21, 1978.
*286 PER CURIAM.
Recently this Court in State v. Curtis, 363 So. 2d 1375 (La.1978), overruling its earlier decision in State v. Wilson, 360 So. 2d 166 (La.1978), held that the application of amended provisions of La.R.S. 15:571.3(C), relative to denial of eligibility for diminution of sentence for good behavior, to a defendant who committed ...
